Package swingtree.style

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundStyle  
    BorderStyle  
    FontStyle  
    Outline
    Outline is an immutable value object that represents the outline of a UI component where every side of the outline can have varying thicknesses and even be completely optional (null).
    ShadowStyle  
    Style
    An immutable, wither based settings container for JComponent styling.
    StyleDelegate<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    A StyleDelegate is a delegate for a JComponent and its Style configuration used to apply further specify the style of said JComponent.
    StyleRenderer<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    This used to smoothly render custom graphics on top of Swing components without requiring the user to override the paint method of the component.
    StyleSheet  
    StyleTrait<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    A StyleTrait is a set of properties that will be used to target specific JComponents matching said properties, so that you can apply custom Stylea to them.
